title: Amazon Essentials Slim Fit Jeans For Men
description: SLIM FIT DESIGN: These mens jeans slim fit are designed with a tapered leg and are fitted through the hip and thigh, while sitting below the waist

ALL-DAY COMFORT: Crafted from mid-weight cotton denim with a bit of stretch, these slim fit jeans provide comfort all day. These jeans come in indigo denim washes or solid colors with a garment wash for a lived in denim-inspired look
STYLE: Featuring a classic five-pocket design, these mens jeans slim fit are ideal for business casual settings or everyday adventures.

DETAILS: These men jeans slim fit feature a zippered fly with a metal button closure, bartack reinforcements, and rivets at the front hand pockets. With stretch denim, it is always recommended to hang to dry for an extended garment life

Crafted from mid-weight cotton denim, these blue jeans for men incorporate a light-stretch fabric, providing all-day comfort. The classic design includes five pockets, a zippered fly, metal button closure, bartack reinforcements, and rivets at the front hand pockets. With a variety of denim washes and solid colors, these Amazon Essentials men's slim jeans offer men's clothing that combines affordability and high standards.
